task.title: Manage Content With a Pending Rights Requests from the Asset Library
task.shortdesc: See and modify the assets in Livefyre with a pending rights request.

step.cmd: Click on Library to access All Assets.
Use the options in the Rights filter to choose a pending rights request status (Requested, Needs Review) for specific assets.
Change the Rights Request status. See for more on how to change Rights Request statuses in All Assets.
